title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 702.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 702.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to modify the instructions
contained in Part 701, "Inmate Grievance Program," of this Title and to assist
facilities specifically approved by the Director, Inmate Grievance Program in
implementing the program at those facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
702.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
